data.title: Bootsik: Potential field calculator
data.name: Potential_Field_Calculator
data.description: A collection of codes for generating and visualising potential magnetic fields. If this numerical code is used, authors kindly request an acknowledgment via citation of paper https://www.aanda.org/articles/aa/full_html/2019/05/aa34684-18/aa34684-18.html

evidence: "bootsik.f90 is a FORTRAN90 code that can be used to generate a potential magnetic field on a 3D mesh"
"bootsik.f90 can be run on a single machine. In this case use the following lines to compile and then simply run the job:  **gfortran -O3 bootsik.f90**"
"The IDL script boobox.pro can then be used to visualise the magnetic field."
